Customer_Portal_Payment_SessionObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Customer_Portal_Payment_SessionObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Customer_Portal_Payment_SessionObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Customer_Portal_Payment_Session_Data.description: This is the actual payment amount the external payment provider paid on your behalf. Note: This amount could be different from  payment amount requested.

validation.validation: When External Payment Record is empty, the Payment Amount Actual must be zero.
When External Payment Record is not empty, the Payment Amount Actual must be equal to the Payment Amount Requested.

Customer_Portal_Payment_Session_Data.description: this is text information for the external payment record, it could be payment ID specified by Payment Provider.
this is response status text provided by external payment provider.
Set this flag to true to end the payment session.

validation.validation: You can't update this payment session because it already has a recorded payment.
You're trying to submit a web service with the customer portal payment type that's not configured in your Workday tenant anymore. Update the customer portal payment type and resubmit.

description: Element containing all Customer Portal Payment Session data
